item.description:
MAJOR DISCUSSION TOPIC!!!

Future FPA Hangar Discussion


By now you have read several emails from me, maybe saw my presentation to the commissioners, and will soon read my corner of the newsletter. The board and I are working on a proposal for a new FPA Chapter Hangar that we are calling the "Aviation Center". It is critical that you come and help shape the future of the FPA!

 

 

A VFR trip across the country

Glen Reinhardt has flown across the country in his Dakota a number of times and has agreed to show us pictures and talk about his adventures. It should be very interesting!

....

! Updates on local flying events, our fly outs and more.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

Where else can you have this much excitement for $30bucks a year?

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site
